item.title: Gretchen Whitmer for governor 2022
item.description: Gretchen Whitmer for governor Governor Gretchen Whitmer was inaugurated as the 49th governor of Michigan on January 1, 2019. Her career includes serving in the Michigan State House, as the first woman Senate Democratic Leader, and prosecutor for Ingham County, fighting for survivorsâ€™ rights and to reform how sexual assault cases are handled. Inspired by her service and family, she is dedicated to improving the lives of all Michiganders. Gov. Whitmer has been a lifelong resident of Michigan, receiving both a BA and JD from Michigan State University.
